artist: Artist: Valerie Haller; Author: Bart Plantenga; Publisher: Lil Dude Graphics, Ocean Grove, N.J.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, image and text printed in offset lithography on coated cover; 35 pp.
inscription: Front flyleaf, blue ink pen: Hey Fly, 8-1-15 / So Nice ... / 30 yrS Since this / book & the un- / bearables / ninplant@xs4all.nL / (illeg. signiture)
title: Before It Gets Lost
